channel.name: OAuth 2.0 via JWT iFormBuilder
channel.description:
This channel shows how one can implement OAuth 2.0 using the Json Web Token (JWT) standard for getting an access token.
See: http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/oauth2-with-iformbuilder
To provide a real reference implementation we do this against the iFormBuilder application which is a cloud application which makes it easy to deploy forms to mobile devices.
